review:
Suvarna Mam is the only Dr I have been referring to,since my parenthood .She is very much approachable and advices in black and white with no hidden factors whoch helps me in making many accurate decisions,be it my child birth or my recent health issues in uterus

Recently I had my Hystroscopy to treat an uterine polyps at apollo health centre vanagaram during a week end ,admitted in hospital.Post to the admission in Ward ,She called up the sister and gave all necessary instruction to prepare myself for the planned procedure .

The sisters are very much caring and with great care helped me to undergo all the procedure elevating my need for my Mom to be my caretaker .My Hubby came to support ..but still I never missed my Mom because I received such love and care from the staff and docter .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was very nice. The dr explained in a simple manner which enable me to understand. Very essily. The medicine prescribed by her also essily available.
